Package user

Class Student

  • Object
    • User
      • Student
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CampCommittee
    public class Student
extends User
    Represents a Student in the system. A student can interact with the various camp, enquiries, registration and suggestions databases.
    Since:
    2023-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Soo Qi Yang, Teo Kai Xuan, Masagca Merwyn Louie Dumasis, Nguyen Phuong Linh, Tee Jeeng Yee
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Student

        public Student​(String name,
               String email,
               Faculty faculty,
               IViewAllCamps studentViewAllCamps,
               ISortCamps iSortCamps,
               IRegisterCamp studentCampRegisterer,
               IDeregisterCamp studentCampDeregisterer,
               IRegisterCommittee commiteeCampRegisterer,
               IViewRegisteredCamps studentRegisteredCampsViewer,
               IFilterCamps iFilterCamps,
               IGenerateStudentReport campComStudentReportGenerator,
               DataList dataList)
        Creates a new Student object, with the given name, faculty, associated user database, and interfaces it requires from CampDataBase and RegistrationDataBase.
        Parameters:
        name - This Student's name.
        email - This Student's email.
        studentViewAllCamps - Interface this Student uses to view all the camps that he can see.
        faculty - This Student's faculty.
        iSortCamps - Interface this Student uses to sort the camps in the database before viewing or generating camp reports.
        studentCampRegisterer - Interface this Student uses to register for camps as an attendee.
        studentCampDeregisterer - Interface this Student uses to deregister from camps.
        commiteeCampRegisterer - Interface this Student uses register for camps as a camp committee member.
        studentRegisteredCampsViewer - Interface this Student uses to view the details of all his registered camps, and his roles in them.
        iFilterCamps - Interface this Student uses to filter the camps.
        campComStudentReportGenerator - Interface this Student uses to generate a report for all the camps the student is a camp committee member of.
        dataList - This Student's associated user database.

        Copy constructor for the this Student.
        Parameters:
        student - This Student to be copied.

        iFilterCamps - Interface this Student uses to filter the camps.

        dataList - This Student's associated user database.

      • registerCampStudent

        public void registerCampStudent​(String campName)
        Registers this Student for a camp. Error message printed on failure.
        Parameters:
        campName - The camp name the student wants to register for.

      • deregisterCamp

        public void deregisterCamp​(String campName)
        Deregisters this Student from a camp. Error message printed on failure.
        Parameters:
        campName - The camp name the student wants to deregister for.

      • registerCampCommittee

        public Student registerCampCommittee​(String campName)
        Registers this Student as a camp committee member for a camp. Upon success, it returns a upgraded campcommittee object. Upon failure, it returns the same student object that initially called the function. The proper use of this function is as follows:

        student=student.registerCampCommittee("campName");

        Parameters:
        campName - The camp name the student wants to register as a camp committee member for.
        Returns:
        On success, a student reference to a promoted camp committee object. On failure, the original student reference that was passed in as a parameter is returned.

      • viewRegisteredCamps

        public void viewRegisteredCamps()
        Prints the details of all the camps the student has registered for, including his roles, in his preferred sorting, filtering order.

      • generateCampComReport

        public void generateCampComReport()
        Requests for the user to input a filename, and generates a report including the camp details, camp participants and their corresponding roles in the said file. If the user is not a Camp committee member of any camps, the file is not generated and an error message is printed to the console.

      • viewAllCamps

        public void viewAllCamps()
        Prints all the camps that are within the student's faculty range, and are visible.
        Specified by:
        viewAllCamps in class User
